turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a drink from Starbucks that's in the Manhattan Mall in NYC.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an Iced Matcha Green Tea Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A Venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Unfortunately, it is not available.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh that's too bad. Then I'll order a Venti Caramel Frappucino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, ask them to add an extra espresso shot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Unfortunately, they ran out of caramel.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, just my bad luck. Then how about a Venti Chai Latte with an extra espresso shot and some honey?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They ran out of honey.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine, then just the Venti Chai Latte with an extra espresso shot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I placed that order for you, one Venti Chai Latte with an added espresso shot. Will that be all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The drink will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great and my receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device by text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great, have a nice day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You too!
